heading: HR00958
0:
A RESOLUTION REQUESTING THE COMMITTEE ON ENVIRONMENT AND NATURAL
RESOURCES TO IMMEDIATELY CONDUCT AN INVESTIGATION, IN AID OF
LEGISLATION, ON THE UNWANTED AND VIOLENT DISPERSAL OF THE
HUMAN BARRICADE BY THE PHILIPPINE NATIONAL POLICE, THEN
ESCORTED, FACILITATED AND MADE POSSIBLE THE ENTRANCE OF FUEL
TANKERS TO THE OCEANA GOLD MINING COMPANY AT BARANGAY
DIDIPIO, KASIBU, NUEVA VIZCAYA
status: Pending with the Committee on RULES since 2020-06-05
history:
House Bill/Resolution NO. HR00958
FULL TITLE : A RESOLUTION REQUESTING THE COMMITTEE ON ENVIRONMENT AND NATURAL RESOURCES TO IMMEDIATELY CONDUCT AN INVESTIGATION, IN AID OF LEGISLATION, ON THE UNWANTED AND VIOLENT DISPERSAL OF THE HUMAN BARRICADE BY THE PHILIPPINE NATIONAL POLICE, THEN ESCORTED, FACILITATED AND MADE POSSIBLE THE ENTRANCE OF FUEL TANKERS TO THE OCEANA GOLD MINING COMPANY AT BARANGAY DIDIPIO, KASIBU, NUEVA VIZCAYA
PRINCIPAL AUTHOR/S : CUARESMA, LUISA LLOREN
DATE FILED : 2020-06-04
ACTIONS TAKEN BY THE COMMITTEE ON RULES
REFERRAL TO THE COMMITTEE ON RULES ON 2020-06-05
